I can't say enough good things about
synergy it's a simple software download
that solves once and for all the problem
of having two keyboards and two mice on
your desk whatever reason you have for
running two computers at a time maybe
you want to test your code in multiple
environments and you don't like VMs or
maybe you've got a a work issued MacBook
but you prefer a PC at home synergy will
allow you to use the same keyboard and
mouse seamlessly across both of them you
just drag and drop the mouse across the
screen and it works in Windows Mac and
even Linux and it isn't even limited to
just two systems you can have as many as
I think we've tested like five at a time
we've got a basic and pro option with a
one-time payment and features include
things like clipboard sharing between
computers dragging and dropping files
between computers the ability to set up
hotkeys and more check out our link in
